divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and son were driving home from vacation on Main Street in Eaton, OH when I noticed a flying object in the air straight in front of us. I got one of feelings that tells you that the object doesn't look familiar and you instantly start feeling like you're witnessing a UFO. Well it made it all more real when the object flew out of sight behind a small group of trees and when we passed the group of trees the object was gone. I thought I was crazy until my wife also started asking where it had gone. I slowed down enough to scan the whole sky and we found nothing. The skies were clear and there was no possible way a airplane could have vanished that quickly after leaving our vision behind a group of trees.
Summary: "Disc Like" UFO spotted over Eaton, then disappears out of plain sight!
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Eaton
There were no other sightings in Eaton on or around July 6th 2012
